title: 🤩🤩 Remarkable Value. Unbeatable Location. 🤩🤩
posting_body: ['We have the perfect apartment for you!', 'Picture yourself here at The Arts Apartments at South Austin in this amazing 1 Bed 1 Bath premier apartment available as soon as September 25th!', 'This apartment is conveniently located on the on the first floor with a pool view.', 'Today the pricing for a lease start date of 09/25/22 and a lease term of 13 months the price is $1440', '*Pricing and availability change daily and are dependent on lease term and lease start date.', 'Call for the most up to date prices.', 'Apartment features:', '*Vinyl Hardwood Plank Flooring Throughout', '*Granite Countertops', '*Cherry Wood Cabinets', '*Carpet in the Bedroom', '*Spacious Closet', '*European Vessel Sinks w/ Vanity', '*Rainfall Showerhead', '*WASHER AND DRYER INCLUDED', 'In our Community, you will find', '*Professionally-equipped 24-hour Fitness Center', '*24-hour Business Center with Free Printing', '*Resort-style Pool with Plenty of Lounge Chairs and Tables as well as a BBQ section', '*BBQ Grills and Picnic Tables throughout the community', '*Amazing Dog Park Perfect for your Furry Friends!', '*Beautiful landscaped courtyards within each Building', '*24-hour Laundry Center', 'Our perfect south central location keeps resident close to everything Austin has to offer.', 'We’re just 10 minutes from downtown and only 5 minutes to the trendy SoCo District.', "Grab a bite at P. Terry's or Torchy's Tacos, or catch a show at one the many nearby live music venues.", 'Shorten your work commute with easy access to I35, MoPac, and Hwy 71/Ben White, and keep your kitchen stocked with just a short drive to your neighborhood HEB, Wal-Mart, or Central Market.', 'We also have MULTIPLE public transportation stops just outside our gates.', 'The best shopping, dining, and entertainment in town is always just a short drive away.', 'ALL PICTURES SHOWN ARE FOR ILLUSTRATION PURPOSE ONLY.', 'ACTUAL PRODUCT', 'MAY VARY DUE TO PRODUCT ENHANCEMENT.', 'Call today or just stop on by and ask about apartment #217!', 'Ask for Arianna and mention you found us on craigslist!', 'Arts at South Austin', 'show contact info', '<URL>']
